Still waiting for half life 3 :( sed life
Do people really would read reviews for a game like half-life ?

Wake up and sing, Mr. Freeman ... Wake up and sing ... No, I do not want to say that you sleep at work ... No one deserves a rest more than yours. And all the efforts of the world would be in vain, until ... Um ... Let's just say that your hour has struck again. The right person in the wrong place can turn the world around. So wake up, Mr. Freeman ... Wake up, great things are waiting for you again.

lets count to 3 shall we:
1
2
2.1
2.2
and thats it.

other than that, a true classic.

It may lack the enemy variety and have less satisfying combat than the original, but it's still one of the finest first person shooters ever made and Half Life Alyx has left me hopeful for a sequel someday.

Also, the gravity gun is one of the best weapons in a computer game.

Having completed this game numerous times, I can say that its a great game.

Maybe not as great as the original but that's just me.

Pros
Sound is great 
Visuals are ok a little dated now a days. Facial animation was top when this game was released 
Gameplay is great. I always liked the combat and set piece fight sections

Cons
The driving sections can be rather dull and the vehicles are a little stiff at times
The game is way to easy even on hardest difficulty

Summary
A must own when its cheap to buy even if you just want to see if all the hype about it was true. I never thought of this game as ground breaking like the first, but its still a fun game to play.
